/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are predominantly red and white, standing out against the clear blue sky. The sun casts a bright light, illuminating the scene and highlighting the details of the buildings. The street itself is lined with parked cars, adding to the urban feel of the image. In the distance, a tall building with a blue glass facade rises above the others, its modern design contrasting with the traditional architecture of the surrounding buildings. The image provides a glimpse into the blend of old and new that characterizes Beijing's cityscape.
